method: Soak the chillies in water for 10 minutes and then deseed.  Dry-fry the dry spices in a wok to release the flavours and then grind to a powder in a pestle and mortar or in a processor/blender.  Add all the other ingredients and grind or blitz to a fine paste.  Store in the refrigerator for up to 2-3 months.
ingredients: 15 dried red chillies,  1 tbsp coriander seeds, ground,  1 tsp cumin seeds, ground,  1 stick cinnamon, ground,  3 cloves, ground,  4 peppercorns, ground,  4 tbsp garlic, chopped,  4 tbsp shallots, chopped,  1 heaped tsp shrimp paste,  1 - 2 sticks lemongrass, chopped,  1 tsp galangal root, chopped,  1 tsp fish sauce
